code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Addition=()=>{const[num1,setNum1]=useState('');const[num2,setNum2]=useState('');const[frontendResult,setFrontendResult]=useState('');const[backendResult,setBackendResult]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleAddition=async()=>{setLoading(true);const result=parseInt(num1)+parseInt(num2);setFrontendResult(result);try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:4001/add',{num1,num2});setBackendResult(response.data.result);}catch(error){console.error('Error occurred:',error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"mt-4",children:"Number Addition"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-md-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",className:"form-control",value:num1,onChange:e=>setNum1(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter first number"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",className:"form-control",value:num2,onChange:e=>setNum2(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter second number"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:handleAddition,disabled:loading,children:loading?'Adding...':'Submit'})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row mt-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-md-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Your Addition Result from(ReactJs) is:"})," ",frontendResult]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Your Addition Result from(Server) is:"})," ",backendResult]})]})})]});};export default Addition;
